features: ❤ [ 100% Leak-proof Compartments Separated Design ] Jelife bento box is a new upgraded super leak-proof silicone ring and sauce compartments design that can keep meals and snacks with sauce fresh and no mess during transport

❤ [ Anti-fall and Kids Friendly Latches] Jelife bento box for kids with sturdy and lightweight material design is perfect for children, designed with 4 kid-friendly latches that are easy for small hands to open and close and no worry the latches broke by accident
❤ [ Safety and High-Quality Material ] Jelife bento lunch box for kids is made of food-safe PP materials, NO PVC, Vinyl, Lead, non-toxic, and BPA-free, safe, kids can be safe to use
❤ [ Microwave and Dishwasher Safe ] Premium pp material bento lunch box is durable and easy to clean, and bento lunch box for kids is perfect for microwaves, ovens, and dishwashers

❤ [ Ideal Bento Lunch Box for School Kids ] Jelife kids bento lunch box with utensils contains 4 practical compartments and is perfect for a child’s appetite to encourage a healthy and balanced meal (recommended for ages 5+)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bento Lunch Box Bento Lunch Box Bento Lunch Box Bento Lunch Box Bento Lunch Box Capacity 1300ML 1100ML 1100ML 1450ML 1450ML Age for 6-15 Years Old 5 - 12 Years Old 5 - 12 Years Old 8+ Years Old 8+ Years Old

About Jelife Store Jelife kids bento box focus on providing convenience for the storage of healthy foods for children. Our great product, your ideal choice. Product Features Security Our Jelife bento box kids is made of PP material, free of PVC, Vinyl, Lead, and BPA, and approved by the CPSIA to ensure safety. Leakproof The no-leak silicone ring of bento lunchbox engages with the food storage containers to create a tight seal that keeps meals and snacks fresh and mess-free. Convenience Four child-friendly locks: help you open and close more easily. our bento box'cover with latches , no worry broke and reoder trouble Anti-drop Design With anti-fall pp material bento lunch box is durable, has anti-drop shock absorption, more suitable for active children. Multi-compartment Design 4 practical compartments: easy to meet balanced nutritional needs, easy to add a variety of lunches, such as fruits, vegetables, cereals, protein, and dairy products.

Product Specifications Color: Blue/Pink/GreenMaterial: PPSize: 8 × 9 × 3 inchesWeight: 460 grams Recommended Age Group Girl: 5+ years oldBoy: 5+ years old Package Included Bento box for children*1Reusable Utensils Set: Spoon*1, Fork*1, Knife*1 Note: All part is dishwasher safeOpen the bento box's cover before placing it into the microwave oven

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars looks soooo cute! Comes with utensils and it fits perfectly into my lunch kit!
reviews.reviewText: The only thing I didn’t like about this bento box is that it can fit a small lunch kit but it doesn’t leave that much space but it’s cheap and recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to open and close.
reviews.reviewText: Love this! I bought it for my son to use for lunch. He has a disability so opening normal containers is really hard for him but this box he is able to open and close by himself without struggling. I’ve never had an issue with it leaking, my son will sometimes put the lid on backwards so the seal isn’t lined up but nothing has ever leaked out of it. I use a bottle brush to clean it with so it super easy to get clean. It’s a great size, probably could use a smaller one for my son but next year it’ll be perfect size for him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars *Updated- cracked at first use
reviews.reviewText: *Updated review: seller contacted me after seeing my review and asked how they could make it right. I replied I wouldn’t be happy unless I had a replacement or a refund. I sent a picture of the cracked inner compartment and two days later, I had a complete replacement in the mail.5 stars for customer service. The product itself has pros and cons.Pros: way cheaper than the pricier B****o boxes.The built in silverware compartment is very handy as well. My girl loved that I was able to slip little notes in the silverware section for her to find with her lunch.Also, it is lightweight compared to the name brand competitor, and the outer section seems very sturdy. Customer service is excellent.Cons: My first one cracked (interior compartment) at first use we’ll see how long this replacement lasts?*Original review:My daughter used this for the first time today for the first day of school. Tonight, when I went to wash it, there is a big crack in the bottom portion leaving it unusable. I am past the 30 days of purchase so I cannot return it even though we just used it for the first time. Bummer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very sweet and useful
reviews.reviewText: a little small but very beautiful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lunch container is very roomy. I like the storage for the included cutlery. You can fit a nice portion in here. My preschool kid does struggle to open it on his own though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s as advertised. It’s a little big for a traditional kids lunchbox if you’re trying to put it in there with a thermos but otherwise it’s durable and easy to clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Handel Not strong enough for kids
reviews.reviewText: The Handel look good and sturdy and she love the color unfortunately it did not last she only had it for 3 week and it broke
